activities: We try to maintain the minimum amount of information as possible from our users. We use personal names and emails to usually send notifications of documents to be signed or about their account activities.  We encrypt the most sesitive data using AES 256 bit technologies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All disputes arising under or relating to our Privacy Statement are to be settled by binding arbitration in the state of California. The arbitration shall be conducted on a confidential basis pursuant to the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) or JAMS that agrees to hear each complaint in compliance with the Framework(s). An award of arbitration may be confirmed in a court of competent jurisdiction. We have staff available to handle most complaints in order to resolve matters quickly with the least amount of tension on both sides. It is very accessible, and we strive to resolve matters as quickly as possible as we only handle customer data and not human resources data.
